Action Bronson Visits World-Renowned Restaurant Noma in New Episode of “F*ck, That’s Delicious”

posted by Joyce on November 4, 2014 in Video

This is one for the food lovers.

It may not seem intuitive, but one of the major benefits of being a successful rapper is getting to eat whatever the fuck you want (see: Rick Ross, Gucci Mane).

In the latest episode of Action Bronson/Munchies’ web series Fuck, That’s Delicious, Bam Bam hops around the globe and feasts on everything, from humble delights like authentic shawarma, hot dogs from Hot Doug’s, and honey butter on freshly baked salted chocolate chip cookies, to more prestigious fare like enormous translucent shrimp from Venice, and every food enthusiast’s dream: a 19-course + five-dessert meal at the world-renowned Noma restaurant.

The episode also features Riff Raff, Big Body Bes, and Meyhem Lauren, who join Action Bronson on his gastronomic adventure. Watch the episode above, and take a look at photos of Bronson’s Noma meal via his Instagram below.
